scripts.docker-preview: yarn run build-preview && docker build . -t preview.trustlines.foundation
scripts.build-preview: yarn run clean && yarn run build-html-preview && yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js-preview && yarn run build-assets
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build-html && yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js && yarn run build-assets
scripts.watch: yarn run clean && yarn run build-assets && concurrently --kill-others -p "[{name}]" -n "HTML,JS,CSS,SERVE,LIVERELOAD" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgYellow.bold" "yarn run watch-html" "yarn run watch-js" "yarn run watch-css" "serve --no-clipboard --listen 8080 ./dist" "livereload ./src --wait 1000 --extraExts 'njk,sass,scss,json'"
scripts.clean: yarn run clean-html && yarn run clean-css && yarn run clean-js && yarn run clean-assets
scripts.build-html: yarn run clean-html && NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.development -e .env.example -- nunjucks **/*.njk --path ./src/view/ --out ./dist/ && yarn run minify-html
scripts.build-html-preview: yarn run clean-html && NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development -e .env.example -- nunjucks **/*.njk --path ./src/view/ --out ./dist/ && yarn run minify-html
scripts.watch-html: yarn run clean-html && NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development -e .env.example -- nunjucks **/*.njk --path ./src/view/ --out ./dist/ --watch
scripts.build-css: yarn run clean-css && NODE_ENV=production node-sass --include-path node_modules ./src/sass/ --output-style compressed --output ./dist/css/$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")/
scripts.watch-css: yarn run clean-css && NODE_ENV=development node-sass --include-path node_modules ./src/sass/ --output-style expanded --source-map true --output ./dist/css/$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")/ && NODE_ENV=development node-sass --include-path node_modules --watch ./src/sass/ --output-style expanded --source-map true --output ./dist/css/$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")/
scripts.build-js: yarn run clean-js && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build-js-preview: yarn run clean-js && NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.watch-js: yarn run clean-js && NODE_ENV=development webpack --watch --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.deploy: WHOAMI= yarn run build && gh-pages --dist dist --branch gh-pages -m 'Auto commit updates [ci skip]'
